title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in Los Angeles 2016 to 2017
summary: This statistic shows the Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in Los Angeles 2016 and .
In the first Quarter of 2016 , the average daily rate for hotels in Los Angeles the country was 224 U.S. dollars .
Accommodation in Los Angeles - additional information The average daily rate of hotels in Los Angeles appears to be much higher in the fourth Quarter of the year , reaching 224 U.S. dollars in 2016 .
